name: Fuseback
description:
Fuseback is a 2D top down survival shooter, this is only a prototype that i made in one week, my idea is to create something a little bigger with more survival stuff to do, you can give me a nice feedback if you want, but don't be mean, thanks!

Controls:
Use WASD to move the player around.
Use the mouse to point and shoot.
Use 1, 2 and 3 to change weapons.
